sn12.51:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn12.51:2.1: “Kittavata nu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivimamsamano parivimamseyya sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya”ti?
sn12.51:2.2: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantamyeva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
sn12.51:2.3: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
sn12.51:2.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn12.51:3.2: ‘yam kho idam anekavidham nanappakarakam dukkham loke uppajjati jaramaranam;
sn12.51:3.3: idam nu kho dukkham kimnidanam kimsamudayam kimjatikam kimpabhavam?
sn12.51:3.4: Kismim sati jaramaranam hoti, kismim asati jaramaranam na hoti’ti?
sn12.51:3.6: ‘yam kho idam anekavidham nanappakarakam dukkham loke uppajjati jaramaranam, idam kho dukkham jatinidanam jatisamudayam jatijatikam jatippabhavam.
sn12.51:3.7: Jatiya sati jaramaranam hoti, jatiya asati jaramaranam na hoti’ti.
sn12.51:4.1: So jaramarananca pajanati, jaramaranasamudayanca pajanati, jaramarananirodhanca pajanati, ya ca jaramarananirodhasaruppagamini patipada tanca pajanati, tatha patipanno ca hoti anudhammacari;
sn12.51:4.2: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya patipanno jaramarananirodhaya.
sn12.51:5.2: ‘jati panayam kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava, kismim sati jati hoti, kismim asati jati na hoti’ti?
sn12.51:5.5: bhave sati jati hoti, bhave asati jati na hoti’ti.
sn12.51:6.1: So jatinca pajanati, jatisamudayanca pajanati, jatinirodhanca pajanati, ya ca jatinirodhasaruppagamini patipada tanca pajanati, tatha patipanno ca hoti anudhammacari;
sn12.51:6.2: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya patipanno jatinirodhaya.
sn12.51:7.10: sankhara panime kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava;
sn12.51:7.11: kismim sati sankhara honti, kismim asati sankhara na honti’ti?
sn12.51:7.14: avijjaya sati sankhara honti, avijjaya asati sankhara na honti’ti.
sn12.51:8.1: So sankhare ca pajanati, sankharasamudayanca pajanati, sankharanirodhanca pajanati, ya ca sankharanirodhasaruppagamini patipada tanca pajanati, tatha patipanno ca hoti anudhammacari;
sn12.51:8.2: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya patipanno sankharanirodhaya.
sn12.51:9.1: Avijjagato yam, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo punnance sankharam abhisankharoti, punnupagam hoti vinnanam.
sn12.51:9.2: Apunnance sankharam abhisankharoti, apunnupagam hoti vinnanam.
sn12.51:9.3: Anenjance sankharam abhisankharoti anenjupagam hoti vinnanam.
sn12.51:9.4: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijja pahina hoti vijja uppanna, so avijjaviraga vijjuppada neva punnabhisankharam abhisankharoti na apunnabhisankharam abhisankharoti na anenjabhisankharam abhisankharoti.
sn12.51:9.5: Anabhisankharonto anabhisancetayanto na kinci loke upadiyati;
sn12.51:9.6: anupadiyam na paritassati, aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati.
sn12.51:9.7: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
sn12.51:10.1: So sukhance vedanam vedayati, sa aniccati pajanati, anajjhositati pajanati, anabhinanditati pajanati.
sn12.51:10.2: Dukkhance vedanam vedayati, sa aniccati pajanati, anajjhositati pajanati, anabhinanditati pajanati.
sn12.51:10.3: Adukkhamasukhance vedanam vedayati, sa aniccati pajanati, anajjhositati pajanati, anabhinanditati pajanati.
sn12.51:10.4: So sukhance vedanam vedayati, visamyutto nam vedayati.
sn12.51:10.5: Dukkhance vedanam vedayati, visamyutto nam vedayati.
sn12.51:10.6: Adukkhamasukhance vedanam vedayati, visamyutto nam vedayati.
sn12.51:11.1: So kayapariyantikam vedanam vedayamano kayapariyantikam vedanam vedayamiti pajanati, jivitapariyantikam vedanam vedayamano jivitapariyantikam vedanam vedayamiti pajanati.
sn12.51:11.2: Kayassa bheda uddham jivitapariyadana idheva sabbavedayitani anabhinanditani sitibhavissanti, sarirani avasissantiti pajanati.
sn12.51:12.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso kumbhakarapaka unham kumbham uddharitva same bhumibhage patisisseyya.
sn12.51:12.2: Tatra yayam usma sa tattheva vupasameyya, kapallani avasisseyyum.
sn12.51:12.3: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kayapariyantikam vedanam vedayamano kayapariyantikam vedanam vedayamiti pajanati, jivitapariyantikam vedanam vedayamano jivitapariyantikam vedanam vedayamiti pajanati.
sn12.51:12.4: Kayassa bheda uddham jivitapariyadana idheva sabbavedayitani anabhinanditani sitibhavissanti, sarirani avasissantiti pajanati.
sn12.51:13.2: api nu kho khinasavo bhikkhu punnabhisankharam va abhisankhareyya apunnabhisankharam va abhisankhareyya anenjabhisankharam va abhisankhareyya”ti?
sn12.51:14.1: “Sabbaso va pana sankharesu asati, sankharanirodha api nu kho vinnanam pannayetha”ti?
sn12.51:15.1: “Sabbaso va pana vinnane asati, vinnananirodha api nu kho namarupam pannayetha”ti?
sn12.51:16.1: “Sabbaso va pana namarupe asati, namarupanirodha api nu kho salayatanam pannayetha”ti?
sn12.51:17.1: “Sabbaso va pana salayatane asati, salayatananirodha api nu kho phasso pannayetha”ti?
sn12.51:18.1: “Sabbaso va pana phasse asati, phassanirodha api nu kho vedana pannayetha”ti?
sn12.51:19.1: “Sabbaso va pana vedanaya asati, vedananirodha api nu kho tanha pannayetha”ti?
sn12.51:20.1: “Sabbaso va pana tanhaya asati, tanhanirodha api nu kho upadanam pannayetha”ti?
sn12.51:21.1: “Sabbaso va pana upadane asati, upadananirodha api nu kho bhavo pannayetha”ti.
sn12.51:22.1: “Sabbaso va pana bhave asati, bhavanirodha api nu kho jati pannayetha”ti?
sn12.51:23.1: “Sabbaso va pana jatiya asati, jatinirodha api nu kho jaramaranam pannayetha”ti?
sn12.51:24.1: “Sadhu sadhu, bhikkhave, evametam, bhikkhave, netam annatha.
sn12.51:24.2: Saddahatha me tam, bhikkhave, adhimuccatha, nikkankha ettha hotha nibbicikiccha.
